title: Update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData)
description: Bug 44164 - update needed in javadoc for constructor Image(Device, ImageData). The constructor for Image(Device, ImageData) can also throw org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Unsupported color depth.
OB: The constructor for Image(Device , ImageData) can also throw org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Unsupported color depth.
SR: To recreate the issue, please follow these steps: import org.eclipse.swt.graphics.
